applicant-name.name: 云南伦扬科技有限公司

invention-title: Method for detecting arsenic in food through nano-enzyme-based colorimetric/surface enhanced Raman scattering
一种纳米酶基比色/表面增强拉曼散射检测食品中砷的方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a method for detecting arsenic in food by nano-enzyme-based colorimetric/surface enhanced Raman scattering, which is characterized in that on the basis of mimic enzyme and Raman increased dual activities of copper-doped dithiothreitol (DTT)-based carbon dots and glucose carbon dot modified gold and silver nano (Au, AgNPs), colorless 3, 3 ', 5, 6-tetramethyl-3, 5-dithiothreitol is oxidized in the presence of hydrogen peroxide, and the arsenic in the food is detected by surface enhanced Raman scattering. According to the present invention, the gold-silver nano-enzyme is a gold-silver nano-enzyme, 2, 2 ', 5, 5'-tetramethyl benzidine (TMB) is blue oxTMB with surface enhanced Raman spectrum activity, the addition of arsenic inhibits the peroxidase activity of the gold-silver nano-enzyme, when the As3 < + > or As5 < + > exists, the As3 < + > or As5 < + > can competitively chelate the sulfydryl in the DTT so as to cause the reassembly of the Au and AgNPs nano-enzyme, and the reassembled nano-enzyme has low peroxidase-like activity so as to significantly inhibit the TMB reaction; based on the principle, high-sensitivity detection of As is realized, and the linear detection limit reaches 0.5 mu g/L. The established method is applied to determination of arsenic in a food sample, has a good standard addition recovery rate, and has the characteristics of simplicity in operation, high sensitivity, rapidness and the like.

本发明公开了一种纳米酶基比色/表面增强拉曼散射检测食品中砷的方法，该方法基于铜掺杂二硫苏糖醇(DTT)基碳点及葡萄糖碳点改性金银纳米(Au,AgNPs)具有的模拟酶及拉曼增加的双重活性，在双氧水存在下氧化无色3,3',5,5'‑四甲基联苯胺(TMB)为蓝色具有表面增强拉曼光谱活性的oxTMB，而砷的加入抑制了金银纳米的过氧化酶活性，当As3+或As5+存在时，能竞争性地螯合DTT中的巯基，导致Au,AgNPs纳米酶的重新组装，而重新组装的纳米酶具有更低的类过氧化酶活性，使TMB反应受到明显抑制。基于这一原理，实现了对As的高灵敏检测，其线检出限达到0.5μg/L。将建立的方法应用于食品样品中砷的测定，具有好的加标回收率，方法具有操作简单、灵敏度高、快速等特点。
